descriptionHtml:
Hello, world! We are happy to bring you this point and click type latest new room escape game specially designed for all escape games lovers. In short, 501 Free New Epic Room Escape Game is a collection of new games in various genres.

A Simple game where you can Investigate cryptic clues, unravel a mystery, and solve puzzles in beautifully illustrated adventure rooms!

Experience the best addictive puzzles and a variety of unique stories enjoyed by millions of players every day. Have you ever dreamed of playing hundreds of room escape game levels for completely free? Have you ever wanted to crush your brain and feed candies to your logical thinking? Here we are with hundreds of puzzles that can match your skills.

Unique Gameplay

In order to pass a level, you have to search for hidden objects, secret clues, perform tasks, solve puzzles, win mini-games and unlock all the mystery doors. More than 500 plus fun adventure scenarios to escape, right from escaping a horror home, designing an escape plan from a freaky garden, be among the prison escape gang, set up a trap in a mansion, and even building a bridge to escape from Zombies. Collect treasures and tools in your inventory, find clues, and enjoy a brilliant escape room experience from the comfort of your mobile device. Fold a paper and write all your clues and hints.

Solve Puzzles

No repetitive puzzles and each puzzle were uniquely designed to test your observation skills, deductive reasoning ability, and if you can break the secret code and solve it, victory is all yours. Match the colors, combine puzzle pieces, slice it up, do anything as your logical brain instructs and solve the puzzles.

Truly Free

Play our entire game for free! Yes, what you have heard was right? All the 501 levels are completely free to play. Added to that, no locked levels. That is, you can start playing the game from 50, you can later switch playing to 100 and more.

Brilliant Hints

Stuck in the level? Scared of not knowing what to do with the inventory items? We are happy to guide you with our unique hint system. It guides you wherever you are stuck, supports you with easy hints, and helps you in finishing the game.

Are you one of those, who are curious about tiny details? Mystery hunter? Chasing the suspects? Investigating the murder? This game is all yours which can feed all your detective thirst. Grab your detective hat and lens and bring out your Sherlock smartness.

We provide you the most valuable 3-D in our game, improving your Diligence, Dazzling graphics, Durable gameplay. Bored in this pandemic locked inside your home? Wish to escape from your home boredness without stepping out? Get away from the bit boring life and start your adventure-filled mystery room escape journey here. Download our game now!

Let's Wrap it up:

- 501 Levels with different doors & exits
- Tricky Challenging brain teaser
- Beautiful graphics designs and sound
- Addictive Gameplay (250 hours)
- Riddling Logical mysterious Puzzles
- Adventure rooms with lots of hidden clues
- No penalties & time limits! Enjoy at your own pace
- Bonus rewards & hints available to guide you.
descriptionShort: Collect items, solve puzzles & design your escape from adventure mystery homes
